entry.title: Sweet as Sugar, Confusing as Hell
entry.summary:
Author: Juanis_Manati

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,169Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Chris gets himself a part time job in a bakery.It’s not something they need because they are having problems with money or anything but because Chris wanted to.The bakery is one close to their house, it’s a small family run business. The owner, his wife and their daughter. Everything started because she was about to start college after her sabbatical year that extended to almost 3 already, but she didn’t want to leave her parents on their own without finding a replacement first.The problem started more with the fact that the little friendly family has this investigation going about which one of the men that accompanied him and sometimes picked him up was the biological one.

entry.title: invisible string, tying you to me
entry.summary:
Author: Bexism

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,571Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The light catches on the object, glinting silver and sharp points.It’s a needle.Buck doesn’t hesitate, doesn’t warn him—just lifts his hand and pricks the needle into the back of it.Eddie barely has time to register the movement before a sudden sting blooms across his skin. His body jerks in an instinctive flinch, breath hitching as he stares down at the back of his hand in disbelief. A tiny bead of blood wells up, vivid against his skin.What the fuck?His head snaps up to the screen, heart hammering. Buck is ghost-pale, his breathing uneven, wide eyes locked onto Eddie’s reaction. There’s a flicker of shock, then something like confirmation.Buck lifts his own hand, a matching red bead of blood on the back of it. The pieces slot into place.Eddie swallows hard, his pulse pounding in his ears. Buck looks scared.“Eddie—our bodies are linked.” or: the one where buck and eddie's bodies are linked and they end up sharing injuries and... other things.

entry.title: Oh my little boy I love you so
entry.summary:
Author: rulovesbuckley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,486Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Seven years ago, Evan Buckley was forced to leave the love of his life and their son, because the church wasn’t accepting of gay relationships and male pregnancies.Seven years ago, Eddie Diaz was forced to marry his girl best friend after he gave birth to his son and pretend he was her child so he wouldn’t get banned from his church.Seven years later, Buck and Eddie are working for the LAFD… on the same team.Will they ever get to be the family they always wanted? Or will they be kept apart by everyone and everything around them?

entry.title: will you be my muse?

Author: TeenJulsie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,305Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 8

And I couldn’t! — I can’t!”***Or the one where Eddie keeps a hidden notebook, a hidden notebook containing his undying love for none other than Evan Buckley

entry.title: Muli
entry.summary:
Author: potatocheeserolls

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,477Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: It's been six hours since their arrival from El Paso and they had been organizing and fixing their things back just like before. Then..Three firm knocks.But why would he knock? He's not even a guest but already a person who belongs to this home. Still, he opens the front door after setting down the furniture.Two familiar officers. His heart crumbles."Mr. Diaz, we're here to inform you about your partner's current situation and being that he's your son's legal guardian. We believe that you should atleast know."

entry.title: Keep Me (In the Pocket of your Jeans)
entry.summary:
Author: Pxrpls

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,388Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 10

Summary: That’s his problem. Buck always manages to make the calls personal, even if they are so far behind his realm of reality. He always makes them about himself, he had been told this way too many times already. And he’s trying to change, he really is. But then there are moments like these in which a little girl needs saving and Buck blurs the line between what’s his job and his own need to be there for everyone he meets. His need to fix everything.   So he stays there, just for that first surgery he keeps reminding himself, just to make sure she makes it out of the ER. Just to make sure Hen is right and she is in good hands. And a few hours later, when she makes it out and the doctor’s look around the waiting room for Cassie’s parents without all the context Buck already has, he stands up. On instinct. Barely even a lie. He couldn’t count it as one when he hadn’t spoken at all. He just stands up. He stands up and he follows the doctor to the ICU. In which Buck worries about the little girl he just saved from a fire, and he gives her a home in his arms.

entry.title: Serendipity
entry.summary:
Author: bluegreen_118

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,000Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 123

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley and his older sister Maddie were adopted by firefighter captain Bobby Nash and his retired cop wife Athena Grant. Buck grew up hard of hearing as long as he could remember. To communicate he speaks and uses American Sign Language, and his sister is completely deaf she only uses American Sign Language.*Eddie Diaz grew up in Texas but when he gets in a car wreck his wife passes away and their five year old son loses his hearing. Eddie found a school for the deaf in Los Angeles. With that he packs their bags and moves to LA.*What happens when two walks of life meet?

Author: brewrosemilk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,437Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 128

Summary: If they could, Eddie knows they would rip themselves open without hesitation—tear through ribs and cartilage with their bare hands just to carve out a space big enough to crawl inside each other’s chests.They would stitch themselves together with bloodied fingers and trembling mouths, gasping and shaking and grateful, never mind the ruin it would leave behind. Anything to stay. Anything to fill up the yawning emptiness clawing at their insides. Anything to make sure there would never again be a world where one of them has to live without the other.
